content:
Validator website and validator jar updated to v

Web validator is available at: https://validator.fhir.org/

Locally executable jar available at https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.validator-wrapper/releases/latest/download/validator_cli.jar

Release details can be found at https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.validator-wrapper/releases/tag/1.0.19
I'm wondering what are the differences between this version of validator_cli.jar and the one available here - other than size.

Hi Peter; both these jars use the same core FHIR code for validation, but the one indicated in this Zulip subject has a web-based user interface wrapped around it for ease of use.

The validator website (here: https://validator.fhir.org/) is our hosted version of this, and instructions on hosting it or using it on your local computer can be found here: https://hl7.github.io/docs/validator-wrapper

Validator website and validator jar updated to v

Web validator is available at: https://validator.fhir.org/

Locally executable jar available at https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.validator-wrapper/releases/latest/download/validator_cli.jar

Release details can be found at https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.validator-wrapper/releases/tag/1.0.20
